original_text: “This is what Sennacherib king of Assyria says: On what are you basing your confidence, that you remain in Jerusalem under siege?
korean_text: 앗수르 왕 산헤립은 이같이 말하노라 너희가 예루살렘에 에워싸여 있으면서 무엇을 의뢰하느냐

sentences.original_text: This is what Sennacherib king of Assyria says:
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 앗수르 왕 산헤립이 말하는 바니라:

sentences.original_text: On what are you basing your confidence,
that you remain in Jerusalem under siege?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 예루살렘에서 포위된 채로 머무는 것이냐?
